April 14, 2021
Cyke82
I'm usually a bit bummed when I see a piece without a movement power to give them some move and attack options, but man, you get a lot for your points here. Especially with the change to CCE, which now gives Cap an 11/3 down the whole dial when he's punching Nazis in the face. That's pretty darn good for only 25 points!
